column4: hi. i'm watching a movie, all dialog stuff is pretty silent, when it comes to action it gets very loud, cant find a way to a) understand dialogs and b) dont disturb my neighbours. is there any solution for that in linux?
what media player are you using? I seem to remember vlc (and probably others) having plugins to
right now totem, but i dont care, if another player can handle this better... i'll try vnc
at least have a look. I can't guarantee it
